features: CETAPHIL ADVANCED RELIEF LOTION WITH SHEA BUTTER: Advanced relief formula fortifies the skin barrier to retain moisture over time and completely restore it over time
REPLENISHES WITH 48-HOUR HYDRATION: Nourishing lotion with 9 moisturizers is clinically proven to lock in moisture to continuously hydrate and protect sensitive skin from dryness
REVEALS SKIN RADIANCE: Deeply hydrating formula visibly enhances skin texture and luminosity
NEW AND IMPROVED INGREDIENT BLEND: Now with hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide)
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: The hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is free of parabens and fragrance
body.description: CETAPHIL Advanced Relief Lotion is formulated with nine moisturizing ingredients, including shea butter, to replenish and restore continuously dry skin. And now formulated with a new blend of key ingredients: hydrating glycerin, panthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin texture and retain skin moisture barrier. This rich lotion immediately improves skin texture and luminosity, and provides long-lasting, 48-hour relief from dryness. Use daily to nourish dry skin and help restore skin natural barrier in just one week. Use with Advanced Relief Cream for continuous skin hydration and restoration of drier areas like hands, feet, knees and elbows. This unique formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic (so it will not clog pores), fragrance and paraben free, and clinically proven to be gentle on all skin tones and types. Effectively defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Formulated specially for continuously dry, sensitive skin, CETAPHIL Advanced Relief Lotion penetrates 10 surface layers deep to soften, smooth and protect skin from dryness for a full 48 hours. Thanks to the unique moisturizing complex, 100% of consumers said skin felt consistently less dry with continued use. Dermatologist developed shea butter formula is proven to provide advanced relief from dryness for all skin tones and types. Formulated with our new ingredient blend of niacinamide (vitamin B3), panthenol (vitamin B5) and hydrating glycerin. This improved formula helps to preserve the skin's moisture barrier, improve water retention, soothe the skin, and improve the overall quality of sensitive skin. It is also hypoallergenic, paraben and fragrance free. Ideal for use on even the most sensitive skin. Enjoy the soothing quality of this rich, hydrating, non-greasy lotion designed to rejuvenate very dry, sensitive skin for more radiant looking skin. It is clinically proven to smooth roughness and reveal more radiant skin after 1 use while also restoring the skin’s moisture barrier over time. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By strengthening and reinforcing the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skin care products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

Advanced 48 hour relief from dryness Experience relief from dryness with CETAPHIL Advanced Relief Lotion, formulated with nine moisturizing ingredients including shea butter and vitamins E, B3 and B5. This nourishing lotion immediately soothes and locks in moisture to relieve continuously or persistently dry skin. Ideal for use all over the body. Instantly enhances skin, restores moisture over time This body lotion transforms dry, dull skin into radiant, healthy-looking skin after just one use, protects the skin from moisture loss for a full 48 hours. When used daily, it can restore the moisture and help rebuild the skin’s natural barrier for improved texture and luminosity. Dermatologist-designed for sensitive skin Like all CETAPHIL moisturizers, CETAPHIL Advanced Relief Lotion was developed with dermatologists and is gentle on even the most sensitive skin. With a gentle, nourishing formula that’s non-comedogenic and fragrance and paraben free, it’s an ideal skincare solution for those with persistently dry skin. Complete your dry, sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily skin care routine with CETAPHIL moisturizers, designed for your skin type, will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling refreshed and comfortably hydrated. Complete your hydrating skin care routine with CETAPHIL Advanced Relief Cream, enriched with shea butter to deeply moisturize and nourish the skin and is ideal for targeting drier areas like hands, feet, knees and elbows.

Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Skin Care Benefit Bar soap gently cleanses face and body without over drying skin Body wash gently cleanses without stripping skin of its natural moisture Buttery lotion instantly replenishes and continuously restores and rebalances skin for 48 hours Buttery soft cream is clinically proven to lock in moisture and leave skin feeling soft, smooth and restored Repairing lotion hydrates to heal, soothe and soften dry, flaky skin Daily use moisturizer gently exfoliates bumps and smooths rough patches to improve skin's texture Skin Type Dry to Normal Sensitive Skin Dry to Normal Sensitive Skin Continuously Dry Sensitive Skin Continuously Dry Sensitive Skin Rough and Flaky Sensitive Skin Rough and Bumpy, Sensitive Skin Key Ingredients Hydrating Glycerin Aloe Vera, Vitamin B5 Shea Butter, specially formulated blend of Glycerin, Vitamin B3 & B5 Shea Butter, Safflower Seed Oil, Vitamin E Ceramides, Amino Acids, Sunflower Seed Oil, and Allantoin Urea 20%, Glycerin Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the product! I have very dry skin & this is so great for morning & evening use. I absolutely love how my makeup goes on and melts into the cream for a nice, dewy finish. No cracks or creases when makeup is applied & looks great ALL DAY. It feels so good on the skin, non greasy, & great to apply before bed, after a shower & cleansing your skin. My go to from now on! Keeps my skin feeling smooth.Great quality.Great value for the $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a bottle of lotion for both of our bathrooms, so having it come as a 2 pack was great. The temperatures are getting steadily colder as winter approaches here in the Great Lakes region and that means extremely dry and chapped hands. I got the lotion to try to be productive. So far so good! Using a full pump is a bit too much since it gives enough lotion for hands and both arms. I recommend doing a ¼ or ½ pump. Within a few minutes the lotion is absorbed leaving behind non greasy, soft, and perfume free hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the regular Cetaphil lotion for years and decided I wanted a little more moisturizing for my skin, so I decided to try this one with the shea butter and some other great moisturizing ingredients. I am so glad that I did! Not that the regular Cetaphil wasn’t helping my skin, but this just went a bit further in the moisturizing department! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great skin care
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for your skin. Keeps your skin moisturized and looking healthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Helps with dry chapped hands. I would purchase again & recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great lotion it absorbs in to my skin fast and doesn’t feel greasy. I like it because it has no fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non sticky fast absorbing
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is the best I've found. It absorbs quickly so I can get dressed immediately. No heavy fragrance. My skin looks so much better even with washing my hands many times per day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used several different lotions but this is the only one that works for me. The Shea butter makes the difference.I also like that it doesn't have a strong perfume smell. Some lotion events are overbearing. This is perfectThe pump doesn't dispense all of the lotion. The tubbing needs to go further into the bottle.
